official_title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Toastmasters International and celebrating its 85th anniversary.

summary.text: Supports the goals and ideals of Toastmasters International and celebrates its 85th anniversary. Encourages individuals throughout the United States to improve their public speaking and leadership skills.

titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Toastmasters International and celebrating its 85th anniversary.
